description: This is an Android Activity class named NoteEditActivity that manages the UI for creating or editing notes. It handles initializing UI components, populating data if editing an existing note, and saving the note through a ViewModel when the save action is triggered.

classes.name: NoteEditActivity
classes.description: An activity for editing or creating notes, including UI initialization, behavior handling for save and navigation, and interaction with ViewModels.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, setting theme, content view, populating fields if editing an existing note, and setting up the toolbar menu actions.
